mapper.select:
SELECT DISTINCT c.* FROM v_coupon c LEFT JOIN v_store_coupon sc ON c.id = sc.coupon_id WHERE 1 = 1 AND c. STATUS = 1
and c.name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
c.and end_at >= NOW()
c.and end_at <= NOW()
and c.is_invalid = #{isInvalid}
and (c.limit_store = 0 OR ( sc.store_id = #{storeId} AND sc.STATUS = 1 ) )
and c.type = #{type}
and c.merchant_id = #{merchantId}
order by ${orderByField} ASC
order by ${orderByField} DESC
order by c.create_time DESC
SELECT * from v_coupon where alias = #{alias} and status = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE v_coupon SET stock = stock - 1, get_count = get_count + 1 WHERE id = #{couponId} AND stock > 0
UPDATE v_coupon c SET get_count_user = get_count_user + 1 WHERE id = #{couponId} AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM v_coupon_fetch cf WHERE coupon_id = c.id AND cf.member_id = #{memberId} )
